title: "Is It Time to Buy the Nasdaq's Biggest Dippers?"
excerpt: "Moderna ( NASDAQ:MRNA), and Baidu ( NASDAQ:BIDU) were the index's biggest losers from Feb. 12 to April 6 -- with those stocks falling 29.5%, 29.3%, and 29%, respectively, across that stretch, according to data from S&P Capital IQ."
